duck: Spoiler (comics), a secondary character in the DC comic book Robin
Spoilers (web series), an "anti-movie review" show hosted by Kevin Smith
Spoiler (sports), a team that has been eliminated from the playoffs, and beats a team that required that win to advance
Don Jardine, a professional wrestler also known as "the Spoiler"
Spoiler effect, an individual unable to win an election or game for him- or herself, but with the power to determine which player among two or more others will win
Spoiler (automotive), a device to modify air flow in order to increase fuel efficiency or improve handling in automobiles
The Spoiler (album) a 1966 album by jazz saxophonist Stanley Turrentine
Spoiler (media), a comment which discloses plot details of a book, play, video game, or film, or is intended to distract attention from a rival
Spoiler (aeronautics), a device to reduce lift in aeronautics
The Spoiler (novel), a 2011 novel by Annalena McAfee

milestones: TV show Firefly's "Serenity" movie trailer released, could spoil enjoyment for fans
Chinese short movie mocks Kim Jong il and his secret agent
20 years on: Sioux City, Iowa remembers crash landing that killed 111
False dawn for Air France flight; debris not from crash, search continues
On the campaign trail, December 2011
Massa wins 2006 Brazilian Grand Prix, Alonso and Renault win championships
Pakistan President Musharraf in Kabul for talks
Fear and loathing on the campaign trail, May 2008
Party supporting Scottish independence from UK wins elections
Strongest earthquake in 40 years hits Southeast Asia

wiki.text:
'Spoiler' may refer to:
* Spoiler (aeronautics), a device to reduce lift in aeronautics
* Spoiler (automotive), a device to modify air flow in order to increase fuel
  efficiency or improve handling in automobiles
* Spoiler (sports), a team that has been eliminated from the playoffs, and beats
  a team that required that win to advance
* Spoiler (media), a comment which discloses plot details of a book, play, video
  game, or film, or is intended to distract attention from a rival
* Spoiler (comics), a secondary character in the DC comic book Robin
* ''Spoiler'' (film), a 1998 Sci-Fi film
* Spoilers (web series), an "anti-movie review" show hosted by Kevin Smith
* Spoiler effect, an individual unable to win an election or game for him- or
  herself, but with the power to determine which player among two or more
  others will win
* Mighty Spoiler, a popular calypso singer
* Don Jardine, a professional wrestler also known as "the Spoiler"
* ''The Spoiler'' (album) a 1966 album by jazz saxophonist Stanley Turrentine
* ''The Spoiler'' (novel), a 2011 novel by Annalena McAfee
wiki.title: spoiler
